page.title: 10ATTITUDES IN MALVERN WELLS
page.content:
Results of a survey of 70 random householders, asked whether they were satisfied with the situation in a number of matters of current concern: no yes no opinion {education system } 37% 52% 11% {family doctor } 86% 14% 0% {hospital treatment} 65% 30% 5% {public transport } 27% 49% 24% {condition of roads } 38% 61% 1% efforts to: { help the disabled} 39% 26% 35% { reduce crime} 17% 40% 43% { reduce unemployment}13% 51% 36%
Strongest views were expressed by those critical of{high unemployment and{rising crime rates.}It was felt more State money should be given to struggling industries and a return be made to more local policemen on foot.
